DOC.brief_title: Comparison Aerosol Delivery Infasurf Usual Care Spontaneously Breathing RDS Patients
DOC.detailed_description: Treatment mask . The study objective document aerosolize Infasurf superior `` usual care '' provide patient effective surfactant therapy less need endotracheal intubation instillation surfactant suspension airway . Two cohort recruit : ( ) patient receive surfactant birth develop RDS first hour life ( b ) patient receive instillation surfactant RDS first hour life , extubated , continue RDS .
DOC.criteria: RDS Patients 1 . NICU patient , ≥1hour age < 24 hour age . 2 . Clinical diagnosis RDS , without chest Xray data . 3 . Inspired oxygen ≥25 % maintain adequate oxygen saturation . 4 . Not intubated 5 . Requiring : 1. nasal continuous positive airway pressure ( nCPAP ) . 1 . Congenital anomaly limit care option require early surgery . 2 . Cardiopulmonary decompensation . 1. hypotension metabolic acidosis ( base excess < 10 meq/l ) . 2 . Oxygen saturation < 88 % start aerosolization . 3 . PaCO2 ≥ 60 mmHg start aerosolization . 3 . Grade 3 Grade 4 intraventricular hemorrhage cranial ultrasound , know . 4 . Acute hypoxic encephalopathy without seizure .
